channel.title: CISA KEV Catalog Updates
channel.description: This feed notifies when CISA updates the KEV catalog.

item.title: KEV Catalog Updated: 2025-08-05
item.description: CISA updated the KEV catalog on 2025-08-05. This update includes 3 new CVE(s): CVE-2020-25078, CVE-2020-25079, CVE-2022-40799
